red fire.title: Crimson Fire
red fire.desc: You are a natural-born leader. Your power color is a bold, intense Red. You are passionate, energetic, and never afraid to take risks. You command attention when you walk into a room.

blue trust.title: Royal Blue
blue trust.desc: You are the anchor. Your power color is a deep, trustworthy Royal Blue. You are reliable, wise, and calm under pressure. People come to you when they need clarity and stability.

yellow creative.title: Electric Yellow
yellow creative.desc: You are the visionary. Your power color is a bright, optimistic Electric Yellow. You see the world differently and bring innovation wherever you go. Your energy is contagious.

black luxury.title: Onyx Black
black luxury.desc: You are the enigma. Your power color is a sophisticated Onyx Black. You value privacy, elegance, and control. You don't need to shout to be heard; your presence is enough.
